original_title: Vance negotiates deal protecting Apple data from UK backdoor demands | Fox News
article_summary: Vice President JD Vance successfully negotiated a deal with the British government to drop demands for a "backdoor" to Apple user data, protecting American privacy and maintaining U.S.-U.K. cooperation, according to a U.S. official. The agreement was made in collaboration with President Donald Trump and Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard.</s>
